text: Michael Gerard Hagerty (May 10, 1954 – May 5, 2022) was an American movie and television actor. He was best known for his recurring role as Mr. Treeger, the building superintendent, on Friends and the manager of a muffler shop on HBO's Lucky Louie. He was born on May 10, 1954 in Chicago, Illinois.Michael G. Hagerty Biography (1954-) ==Death== Hagerty died while in a coma after having a seizure on May 5, 2022 at Cedars-Sinai Medical Center in Los Angeles, California, five days before his 68th birthday.Mike Hagerty Dies: ‘Friends’ & ‘Somebody Somewhere’ Actor Was 67 His seizure was caused from a reaction to antibiotics he was taking for an infection in his leg. ==Filmography== *The Goldbergs (2014) *Back In The Day (2014) *Brooklyn Nine-Nine (2013) * Community (2013) *Thin Ice (2011) *Good Luck Charlie (2010) *Medium (2010) *Monk (2009) *Entourage (2007) *Lucky Louie (2006) *Desperate Housewives (2006) *Complete Savages (2004) *Deadwood (2004) *ER (2002) *Curb Your Enthusiasm (2001) *Inspector Gadget (1999) *Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me (1999) *Ally McBeal (1998) *Speed 2: Cruise Control (1997) *The Drew Carey Show (1996) *Friends (1995–2001) *Martin (1995) *Seinfeld (1994) *The George Carlin Show (1994-1995) *The Building (1993) *So I Married an Axe Murderer (1993) *V.I. Warshawski (1991) *The Wonder Years (1991) *Wayne's World (1992) *Star Trek: The Next Generation (1991, 1994) *Get a Life (1990) *Murphy Brown (1989) *Red Heat (1988) *Family Ties (1988) – Vinnie *Overboard (1987) - Billy Pratt *Married with Children (1987) - Coroner *Nothing in Common – Eric *Cheers (1986) – Decker *Brewster's Millions (1985) – Furniture Warehouseman *Doctor Detroit (1983) – Cop #2 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1954 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Actors from Chicago Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Drug-related deaths in the United States Category:Deaths from seizure
